sentences.en: A riding accident left him immobile.
sentences.cn: 一场骑马意外事故导致他瘫痪。

sentences.en: Antonio has been riding high ever since he changed his job.
sentences.cn: 自从安东尼奥换了工作后,他一直很成功.

sentences.en: Billions of pounds are riding on the outcome of the election.
sentences.cn: 几十亿英镑都取决于这次选举的结果。

sentences.en: Few jockeys continue race-riding beyond the age of 40.
sentences.cn: 很少有职业赛马骑师超过40岁仍继续参加赛马的。

sentences.en: He has been riding in horse trials for less than a year.
sentences.cn: 他参加赛马选拔赛还不到一年。

sentences.en: He prefers travelling on the Tube to riding in a limousine.
sentences.cn: 他更愿意乘地铁出行，不愿坐豪华轿车。

sentences.en: He was riding on his horse looking for the castle.
sentences.cn: 他正骑着马寻找那座城堡。

sentences.en: He was wearing riding pants, high boots, and spurs.
sentences.cn: 他穿着马裤和长筒靴，靴上带着马刺。

sentences.en: I had fondly imagined that riding a mule would be easy.
sentences.cn: 我曾经天真地以为骑骡子很容易.

sentences.en: Riding bulls is always an exciting event at a rodeo.
sentences.cn: 骑公牛总是放牧人竞技会上激动人心的表演.

sentences.en: Shall we go riding on Saturday?
sentences.cn: 我们星期六去骑马好吗？

sentences.en: Should the weather be rough, we won't be able to go riding.
sentences.cn: 万一是狂风暴雨的天气, 我们就不能去骑马.

sentences.en: surfers riding the crest of the wave
sentences.cn: 正在浪峰上冲浪的运动员

sentences.en: They accused him of riding on the coat-tails of the president.
sentences.cn: 他们指责他是沾了总统的光。

sentences.en: Two men riding on motorcycles opened fire on him.
sentences.cn: 两个骑摩托车的男人向他开了枪。
